• Home
  • Phone
  • Wallet
  • Keys

This sample 11ty website is designed to showcase a list of three things that I can't leave home without. For the purposes of this project, three is literally the perfect number, as there are exactly three things that I can't leave home without, that I take with me almost everywhere I go. They are not particularly interesting or unique, but below is an abridged list:

  • My phone
  • My wallet
  • My keys
